name: Roots of Evil
description:
Play as a tree that feeds on nothing but the blood of nearby lumberjacks. Use your powerful roots to pounce onto your prey, destroying your foes one by one and feasting on their blood until you make your way to the end of your dastardly orchard.

CONTROLS:

Left Click - Aim/Pounce

Escape - Reload Level

Made by: Noah Schultz, Matthew Kilmer

Created in 48 hrs for Global Game Jam 2023
